ui.js

Summary
ui.js
UIManagerSingleton top-level UI manager.
Variables
_devModeIf true (set by an url parameter), adds extra features to the screen.
_pageBoundsStores the page bounds.
_closedLastVisibleTabIf true, the last visible tab has just been closed in the tab strip.
_closedSelectedTabInTabCandyIf true, a select tab has just been closed in tab candy.
_stopZoomPreparationIf true, prevent the next zoom preparation.
_reorderTabItemsOnShowKeeps track of the Groups which their tab items’ tabs have been moved and re-orders the tab items when switching to Tab Candy.
_reorderTabsOnHideKeeps track of the Groups which their tab items have been moved in Tab Candy UI and re-orders the tabs when switcing back to main browser.
_currentTabKeeps track of which <Tabs> tab we are currently on.
Functions
initMust be called after the object is created.
_secondaryInitThis is the bulk of the initialization, kicked off automatically by init once the system is ready.
_delayInitCalled automatically by _secondaryInit once sessionstore is online.
getActiveTabReturns the currently active tab as a TabItem
setActiveTabSets the currently active tab.
_isTabCandyVisibleReturns true if the TabCandy UI is currently shown.
showTabCandyShows TabCandy and hides the main browser UI.
hideTabCandyHides Tab candy and shows the main browser UI .
_setActiveTitleColorUsed on the Mac to make the title bar match the gradient in the rest of the TabCandy UI.
_addTabActionHandlersAdds handlers to handle tab actions.
tabOnFocusCalled when the user switches from one tab to another outside of the TabCandy UI.
setReorderTabsOnHideSets the group which the tab items’ tabs should be re-ordered when switching to the main browser UI.
_setBrowserKeyHandlersOverrides the browser’s keys for navigating between tab (outside of the TabCandy UI) so they do the right thing in respect to groups.
_setTabViewFrameKeyHandlersSets up the key handlers for navigating between tabs within the TabCandy UI.
_createGroupOnDragCalled in response to a mousedown in empty space in the TabCandy UI; creates a new group based on the user’s drag.
_resizeUpdate the TabCandy UI contents in response to a window size change.
_addDevMenuFills out the “dev menu” in the TabCandy UI.
_resetWipes all TabCandy storage and refreshes, giving you the “first-run” state.
storageSanityGiven storage data for this object, returns true if it looks valid.
_saveSaves the data for this object to persistent storage
_saveAllSaves all data associated with TabCandy.
_arrangeBySiteBlows away all existing groups and organizes the tabs into new groups based on domain.

UIManager

Singleton top-level UI manager.

Summary
Variables
_devModeIf true (set by an url parameter), adds extra features to the screen.
_pageBoundsStores the page bounds.
_closedLastVisibleTabIf true, the last visible tab has just been closed in the tab strip.
_closedSelectedTabInTabCandyIf true, a select tab has just been closed in tab candy.
_stopZoomPreparationIf true, prevent the next zoom preparation.
_reorderTabItemsOnShowKeeps track of the Groups which their tab items’ tabs have been moved and re-orders the tab items when switching to Tab Candy.
_reorderTabsOnHideKeeps track of the Groups which their tab items have been moved in Tab Candy UI and re-orders the tabs when switcing back to main browser.
_currentTabKeeps track of which <Tabs> tab we are currently on.
Functions
initMust be called after the object is created.
_secondaryInitThis is the bulk of the initialization, kicked off automatically by init once the system is ready.
_delayInitCalled automatically by _secondaryInit once sessionstore is online.
getActiveTabReturns the currently active tab as a TabItem
setActiveTabSets the currently active tab.
_isTabCandyVisibleReturns true if the TabCandy UI is currently shown.
showTabCandyShows TabCandy and hides the main browser UI.
hideTabCandyHides Tab candy and shows the main browser UI .
_setActiveTitleColorUsed on the Mac to make the title bar match the gradient in the rest of the TabCandy UI.
_addTabActionHandlersAdds handlers to handle tab actions.
tabOnFocusCalled when the user switches from one tab to another outside of the TabCandy UI.
setReorderTabsOnHideSets the group which the tab items’ tabs should be re-ordered when switching to the main browser UI.
_setBrowserKeyHandlersOverrides the browser’s keys for navigating between tab (outside of the TabCandy UI) so they do the right thing in respect to groups.
_setTabViewFrameKeyHandlersSets up the key handlers for navigating between tabs within the TabCandy UI.
_createGroupOnDragCalled in response to a mousedown in empty space in the TabCandy UI; creates a new group based on the user’s drag.
_resizeUpdate the TabCandy UI contents in response to a window size change.
_addDevMenuFills out the “dev menu” in the TabCandy UI.
_resetWipes all TabCandy storage and refreshes, giving you the “first-run” state.
storageSanityGiven storage data for this object, returns true if it looks valid.
_saveSaves the data for this object to persistent storage
_saveAllSaves all data associated with TabCandy.
_arrangeBySiteBlows away all existing groups and organizes the tabs into new groups based on domain.

Variables

_devMode

If true (set by an url parameter), adds extra features to the screen.  TODO: Integrate with the dev menu

_pageBounds

Stores the page bounds.

_closedLastVisibleTab

If true, the last visible tab has just been closed in the tab strip.

_closedSelectedTabInTabCandy

If true, a select tab has just been closed in tab candy.

_stopZoomPreparation

If true, prevent the next zoom preparation.

_reorderTabItemsOnShow

Keeps track of the Groups which their tab items’ tabs have been moved and re-orders the tab items when switching to Tab Candy.

_reorderTabsOnHide

Keeps track of the Groups which their tab items have been moved in Tab Candy UI and re-orders the tabs when switcing back to main browser.

_currentTab

Keeps track of which <Tabs> tab we are currently on.  Used to facilitate zooming down from a previous tab.

Functions

init

init: function()

Must be called after the object is created.

_secondaryInit

_secondaryInit: function()

This is the bulk of the initialization, kicked off automatically by init once the system is ready.

_delayInit

_delayInit : function()

Called automatically by _secondaryInit once sessionstore is online.

getActiveTab

getActiveTab: function()

Returns the currently active tab as a TabItem

setActiveTab

setActiveTab: function(tab)

Sets the currently active tab.  The idea of a focused tab is useful for keyboard navigation and returning to the last zoomed-in tab.  Hitting return/esc brings you to the focused tab, and using the arrow keys lets you navigate between open tabs.

Parameters

  • Takes a TabItem

_isTabCandyVisible

_isTabCandyVisible: function()

Returns true if the TabCandy UI is currently shown.

showTabCandy

showTabCandy: function(zoomOut)

Shows TabCandy and hides the main browser UI.  Parameters: zoomOut - true for zoom out animation, false for nothing.

hideTabCandy

hideTabCandy: function()

Hides Tab candy and shows the main browser UI .

_setActiveTitleColor

_setActiveTitleColor: function(set)

Used on the Mac to make the title bar match the gradient in the rest of the TabCandy UI.

Parameters

settrue for the special TabCandy color, false for the normal color.

_addTabActionHandlers

_addTabActionHandlers: function()

Adds handlers to handle tab actions.

tabOnFocus

tabOnFocus: function(tab)

Called when the user switches from one tab to another outside of the TabCandy UI.

setReorderTabsOnHide

setReorderTabsOnHide: function(group)

Sets the group which the tab items’ tabs should be re-ordered when switching to the main browser UI.  Parameters: group - the group which would be used for re-ordering tabs.

_setBrowserKeyHandlers

_setBrowserKeyHandlers : function()

Overrides the browser’s keys for navigating between tab (outside of the TabCandy UI) so they do the right thing in respect to groups.

_setTabViewFrameKeyHandlers

_setTabViewFrameKeyHandlers: function()

Sets up the key handlers for navigating between tabs within the TabCandy UI.

_createGroupOnDrag

_createGroupOnDrag: function(e)

Called in response to a mousedown in empty space in the TabCandy UI; creates a new group based on the user’s drag.

_resize

_resize: function(force)

Update the TabCandy UI contents in response to a window size change.  Won’t do anything if it doesn’t deem the resize necessary.  Parameters: force - true to update even when “unnecessary”; default false

_addDevMenu

_addDevMenu: function()

Fills out the “dev menu” in the TabCandy UI.

_reset

_reset: function()

Wipes all TabCandy storage and refreshes, giving you the “first-run” state.

storageSanity

_storageSanity: function(data)

Given storage data for this object, returns true if it looks valid.

_save

_save: function()

Saves the data for this object to persistent storage

_saveAll

_saveAll: function()

Saves all data associated with TabCandy.  TODO: Save info items

_arrangeBySite

_arrangeBySite: function()

Blows away all existing groups and organizes the tabs into new groups based on domain.
